title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

General Considerations

For Task A1, the response must describe the judicial power exercised by the court in the Windsor case.

For Task A2, the response must explain why this power gives the Supreme Court the authority to take the action described.

For Task B, the response must explain how states could act to affect the impact of the Courtâ€™s decision in United States v. Windsor.

For Task C1, the response must describe the Constitutional clause in the Fifth Amendment that relates to the United States v. Windsor case.

For Task C2, the response must explain how the decision in the Windsor case could affect future cases.
